about_the_game:
Do you like beautiful games with jetpack filled action, shooting, rolling, spaceships, and breaking? Jank is no longer following the rules there are too many secrets to uncover for this one robot to work alone.

Take on a unique experience with a distinctive hand-drawn design and amazing mechanics to pair with it. Immerse yourself in this world while trying to uncover it's many dark sides and your unknown past.


Features
  • 5 different zones with different styles of gameplay with individual levels in each
  • Different Mechanics: Rolling, Jetpacks, Grappling guns, and more to come!
  • Flying spaceships
  • Explore abandoned (or not so abandoned) buildings
  • Rude lady robot that bosses you around

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or later
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements are not final

name: Jank Saves the World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: dual core 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: intel hd 520
  • DirectX: Version 10

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
